channel.title: Php
channel.description:
I am trying to get PHPbb or SMF up, these both require PHP and Mysql...
I *think* i got MYsql up but, i still don't know where to start with PHP...
Anyone with any experience in this topic *cough* _mopar_ *cough* can you point me in the right direction?
invision free is great but, not exactly what i want

item.title: Php
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

deadlycow21:

well, i tryed using apache while i had ubuntu installed but, i couldn't get my WiFi up... maybe later i will try again... or get a cruddy computer w/ ethernet instead of WiFi and host through that... and then get a domain and i would be running at about $5 per month :P, right?

a domain costs $2.99 a year through yahoo.com, but running it on your own server probably isnt the best idea in the world...

Read full topic

item.title: Php
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

itendsnow:

Yeah, you can search for free hosts however there are many hosts that do quite cheap php and mysql hosting. Â£20 for 500mb space and 5gb bandwidth for a certain host (PM if you want info, I dont want to advertise companies) Bear in mind that if you are just starting up a forum/community unless it's already got quite a following its unlikely you'll need expensive hosting.

Try startlogic, they got 5gb space, 100gb/month bandwidth, and its only 30 dollars a year

Read full topic

item.title: Php
item.dc:creator: @blackhat blackhat
item.description:
@blackhat wrote:

lol WINODWS!!

man u need to go linux find a host with Cpannel and PHPMYadmin

Do a search on google for free PHP hosting most only allow one msql database.

i think you should do some tutorials on linux and phpadmin first before you even begin to think about administrating a board!!
